full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DUL BA RGYA MTSO'I SNYING PO BSDUS PA'I RNAM BSHAD 'PHAGS NOR RIN CHEN 'DREN PA'I GRU GZINGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @047A *, ,(CES RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS MDZAD PA'I 'DUL BA RGYA MTSO'I SNYING PO BSDUS PA'I 'GREL BA 'PHAGS NOR RIN CHEN 'DREN PA'I GRU GZINGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NYID KHU PO GE SHI RA'I T'A BLA MA NOM CHI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS, CHAS PA BDE THANG CHOS RJE BLO BZANG RIN CHEN, NANG SO TEM CHI DPAL 'BYOR, HOR CHA PI LIG THU DGE BSKOS SHES RAB RDO RJE RNAMS KYIS MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR ZHING, AO'I ROD DGE SLONG CHOS 'PHEL RGYA MTSOS PAR YIG GI PHYI MO PA DANG, RANG GI GAM DU GNAS PA'I SLOB MA DGE TSUL TSUL KHRIMS DPAL 'BYOR GYIS MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR BA DANG ZHUS DAG PA BGYIS TE PAR DU BZHENGS PA'I TSE PAR BYANG DANG SMON LAM TSIGS BCAD DGOS ZHES KHUNG RNAMS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR 'GREL BA RTZOM PA BO NYID KYIS BGYIS PA DGE LEGS SU GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
